Title: The Mandate of the Red
Description:
Our calling is care and compassion. We aid the other flights not only for their own sake, but for the sake of dragonkind as a whole.

Perhaps speaking with the dragonspawn here at the Ruby Lifeshrine will help you understand us further.
ObjectivesText: Talk to the tenders at the Ruby Lifeshrine.
RewardText: I hope you have grown to appreciate what we do.
